Mendokusai

Tartarus

Staff Car Parks

20 Feb 2020

The parking situation at the local hospital is, frankly, a fucking nightmare. It’s always so full that not only are there no spaces, but cars are scattered all over the shop, protruding onto the roads and paths and just making the whole experience unnecessarily cumbersome.

There is however, a staff car park. The forbidden fruit - an oasis of gravel and opportunity amidst the frozen tundra of why-are-there-never-any-fucking-spaces.

So I parked there, because life is too short not to. Fuck the rules.
